name: leppa-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is out of PP for one of its moves, it consumes this item to restore 10 of that move’s PP. Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for a selected move.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when a move runs out of PP to restore its PP by 10.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore 10 PP to a depleted move during battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore 10 PP to a depleted move during battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore 10 PP to a depleted move during battle.
